channel.title: Mastermind converted jailed target
channel.description:
What Happened: So, I've been having weird connectivity issues that are probably due to my side. However, it's caused some weird situations. Just now I had a game as Prince where I had jailed the slot 3 player, a physician. In the middle of the night, I lagged out for a moment and when I reconnected, it was day and the slot 16 Sheriff was claiming that his Scout on 3 was triggered by a conversion. Obviously this seemed impossible, so I dragged him to jail and executed him for being a Scorned. But he wasn't. He was actually a sheriff and 3 actually was converted while in jail.
What Should've Happened: Obviously, the physician should've been safe from conversions because being stuffed in my cozy little cell is supposed to act as a prevention. Instead, they were in a state of jailed, but not.
Steps to reproduce: I'm not sure when the game recognized that I had disconnected and attempted reconnection because I could talk just fine while 3 was jailed. My log reverted back to before I input that I jailed 3, but I did that at night. As far as reproducing it, I have no idea.
Comments: Side Note - I also got pushed on because a Butler loudly proclaimed I had to be NK for being occupy immune. That was weird and added to the confusion.
